pr_title: iOS - SwiftLint: Convert large tuples to structs.

timeline.message: swiftlint: Convert large tuples to structs.

timeline.bodyText: if searchText is not used, you could remove it
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: It's been used and I see some logic handled with an empty string.
replies.author: tushar-boston

timeline.bodyText:
where is this method called? I am assuming that you would need to also change the code there.
If this method is not used, maybe it can be removed instead?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: It's called at multiple places. However, no changes required because of the same properties are accessed as a tuple instance.
replies.author: tushar-boston
